summary: This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank for Southern Financial LLC, detailing account activity, portfolio holdings, and disclosures for the period of December 1, 2018, to December 31, 2018. It includes information on account values, income, and various financial transactions, as well as important disclosures regarding the role of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker. This document appears to be a financial statement for Southern Financial LLC, detailing account activity, including deposits, withdrawals, and portfolio holdings for the period of November 1, 2018, to November 30, 2018. It includes information on dividends received, interest income, and the overall performance of the account, as well as disclosures regarding FDIC insurance and investment risks. This document appears to be a financial statement for Southern Financial LLC, detailing account transactions, balances, and investment activities for the period of October 1, 2018, to October 31, 2018. It includes information about cash deposits, withdrawals, and the performance of various securities held in the account. This document contains financial disclosures and account information related to Southern Financial LLC, including details about account management, transactions, and investment performance for the period of September 1, 2018, to September 30, 2018. It outlines the roles of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker and provides important disclosures regarding arbitration agreements and FDIC insurance. This document appears to be a financial statement related to an account held by Southern Financial LLC, detailing account activity, balances, and disclosures regarding transactions and arbitration agreements. It includes information about the roles of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker and custodian for the account, as well as various financial disclosures and terms of service. This document appears to be a financial statement detailing account activity for Southern Financial LLC, including portfolio holdings, cash deposits, and transactions for the period of July 1, 2018, to July 31, 2018. It includes information on dividends, interest income, and the performance of equities held in the account. This document contains financial disclosures and account summaries for Southern Financial LLC, detailing transactions, account balances, and investment holdings for the period of June 1, 2018, to June 30, 2018. It includes information on FDIC insured bank deposits, dividends, interest income, and the overall performance of the portfolio. This document contains financial disclosures and account information related to transactions processed by Pershing LLC, a clearing broker. It includes details about interest credited, substitute payment reimbursements, and important disclosures regarding account management and arbitration agreements. This document appears to be a financial statement for Southern Financial LLC, detailing account activity, portfolio holdings, and investment performance for the period from May 1, 2018, to May 31, 2018. It includes information on dividends, interest income, and the overall value of the account, as well as disclosures regarding the handling of securities and bank deposits. This document contains financial statements and disclosures related to Southern Financial LLC, including account balances, transactions, and arbitration agreements. It outlines the performance of investments, including equities and bank deposits, and provides details on interest income and withdrawals. The document emphasizes the arbitration process for disputes and the implications of investing in various financial products. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank for Southern Financial LLC, detailing account activity, holdings, and disclosures related to investments and bank deposits for the period of March 1, 2018, to March 31, 2018. It includes information about account values, interest credited, and the role of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank for Southern Financial LLC, detailing account information, transactions, and disclosures related to investments. It includes information on account balances, investment performance, and the role of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker. The document emphasizes the importance of understanding the terms and conditions associated with the account. This document contains financial disclosures and account summaries related to Southern Financial LLC, including details about portfolio holdings, transactions, and account management. It outlines the performance of various investments, including bank deposits and equities, and provides information on fees and interest rates associated with the account. This document appears to be a financial statement related to an account managed by Pershing LLC, detailing transactions, interest earned, and disclosures regarding investment practices. It includes information about bank deposits, mutual funds, and the role of Pershing as a clearing broker. The document emphasizes the importance of understanding the risks associated with investments and the limitations of protections offered.
